text: Embrace life among the Grand Canyon and Southern Utah's natural wonders! This home is 39 miles from Kanab and the famous Narrows, 96 miles from Bryce Canyon National Park, 47 Miles from Zion National Park and 100 miles from the North Rim, & 35 from Hurricane. It is like living in a dream. The two-level addition was constructed in 2024 - stunning! This home rests at the base of beautiful mountains with 360' views. It can be utilized for short-term rentals, long-term rentals or the primary home you've been waiting for! The resort-like fully fenced yard has a custom pool and hot tub, putting green, pickleball and basketball courts, playground, garden area, RV and trailer parking, fire pits, pergola, covered patios and second story balconies. The home showcases a gym, game room with a sauna, 7 bedrooms and 5.5 baths, as well as a custom chef's kitchen with walk-in pantry and commercial refrigerator/freezer. The huge primary suite upstairs has incredible views and its own laundry. An attached casita/guest suite can be rented out or provide privacy to long-term guests or live-in parents/children. It also boasts a 4-car garage with epoxy floors and RO water throughout. Call to tour today!
formatted_address: 385 S Hilldale St, Colorado City, AZ, 86021

text: This beautiful home is barely over a year old and is set on a .39-acre lot, has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and a 3-car garage with a newly finished epoxy floor. Step inside to an inviting open-concept floor plan, complemented by a formal dining room featuring a striking stone accent wall. The kitchen showcases high-end finishes, including top-of-the-line Caf appliances, quartzite countertops, a pot filler, and Moen faucets.The living room is a showstopper, centered around a custom fireplace framed by built-in cabinetry, open shelving, and newly added wood ceiling beams that bring warmth and architectural character to the space.Your primary suite offers a spa-like bathroom with a stunning tiled feature wall behind the soaking tub, a walk-in shower, an LED-lit vanity mirror, and a walk-in closet. The front yard features low maintenance landscaping and a covered patio, ideal for taking in mountain views and breathtaking sunsets. There has been some landscaping done to the backyard and it is just is just steps away from becoming your personalized sanctuary. As an added bonus, this home can be sold fully furnished with a separate bill of sale for a truly turnkey experience.
formatted_address: 1245 W Township Ave, Colorado City, AZ, 86021

text: If you appreciate views this property is for you! 5,595 sq ft, built in 2000, located on 0.95 Acre with a large work shop that is currently rented month to month, and the tenant might be interested in staying if the buyer is interested in having good income to subsidize the remodeling of this home. The interior work has been started for a complete remodel and is being sold in as-is condition. Colorado City/Hilldale has experienced major growth over the past few years where new business is flocking with many new restaurants, lots of small businesses, a winery, a big beautiful grocery store that also has a restaurant/bar up on the second floor with incredible views Utah s El Capitan. If you haven t been to Water Cayon & Maxwell Park yet, you need to see it! The views in the canyon are amazing and the spring water is too! Miles of amazing hiking trails comparable to hiking Zion without the crowds! The location of this home is amazing for outdoor recreation, 20 minutes down the road is the Hurricane Cliffs outdoor recreation paradise with miles of mountain biking & hiking single track trails, only 1 hour to Zion, a 2 hour drive to Lake Powell and 3 hours to the Grand Canyon North Rim, if you enjoy the outdoors this home is for you!
formatted_address: 245 W Warren Ave, Colorado City, AZ, 86021

text: Investor alert! This 7-unit multifamily property has 19 bedrooms and 16.5 bathrooms, and sits on a nearly 1-acre lot.
